docs.snippet: Developments in Mexico that led to the recognition of women as "citizens" entitled to take an active part in the political affairs of their nation were sketched here yesterday by Mrs. Margarita Robles de Mendoza, founder of the Union of American...
docs.lead_paragraph: Developments in Mexico that led to the recognition of women as "citizens" entitled to take an active part in the political affairs of their nation were sketched here yesterday by Mrs. Margarita Robles de Mendoza, founder of the Union of American Women and Mexico's leading feminist.
docs.abstract: Mrs M R de Mendoza revs victory

headline.main: FEMINIST REVIEWS MEXICAN VICTORY; Mrs. M.R. de Mendoza Played a Leading Role in 18-Year Fight for the Ballot.

docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges were under pressure last week, an aftermath of the tense political situation growing out of the Italian-Ethiopian affair. Invariable lower cables from abroad, before our opening here, gave a hint of the unsettlement there and was...
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges were under pressure last week, an aftermath of the tense political situation growing out of the Italian-Ethiopian affair. Invariable lower cables from abroad, before our opening here, gave a hint of the unsettlement there and was followed here by local operators. The trading pace was not fast, business on the whole being light and the demand at a low ebb.

docs.snippet: Weakness in the Holland guilder stood out as the most important price change of the week's trading in the foreign currencies. It touched a low of 67.32 cents on Friday, lowest since July 27. There was a collateral break in the futures market, 90-day...
docs.lead_paragraph: Weakness in the Holland guilder stood out as the most important price change of the week's trading in the foreign currencies. It touched a low of 67.32 cents on Friday, lowest since July 27. There was a collateral break in the futures market, 90-day forwards selling at a discount of 320 points.
